p: The cytotoxicity of hydromethanolic and aqueous extracts of Morus alba var. alba, Morus alba var. rosea, and Morus rubra was evaluated in human embryonic pulmonary epithelial cells: L-132 cell line (ATCC CCL-5), according to the MTT assay, as proposed by the authors of [ 29]. The cells were grown in Eagleâ€™s minimum essential medium (MEM) (Sigma-Aldrich, St Quentin Fallavier, France) supplemented with 10% of heat-inactivated fetal bovine serum (FBS) (Sigma-Aldrich, St Quentin Fallavier, France).
